text: Georg Christoph Biller (20 September 1955 â€“ 27 January 2022) was a German choral conductor. He conducted the Thomanerchor as the sixteenth Thomaskantor from 1992 to 2015. Biller died on 27 January 2022 in Leipzig, Germany from problems caused by motor neurone disease, aged 66. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease Category:German academics Category:German conductors Category:Musicians from Leipzig Category:20th-century German composers Category:21st-century German composers
title: Georg Christoph Biller
